item.title: Ffs lal, why wont this work?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I know this correct… No errors. But it’s not showing up…

public boolean isInArea(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) {
    if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2)) return true;
    return false;
  }
public boolean ImInWild() {
if (isInArea(2951, 3330,3963, 3521)) return true; 
return false;
}

My wildy level…

WildyLevel = (((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1);
if(ImInWild()) {
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@yel@Level: "+WildyLevel, 199);
} else {
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@gre@Safe!", 199);
}
}
public void CheckWildrange(int pcombat)
{
if(((combat + WildyLevel >= pcombat) && (pcombat >= combat)) || ((combat - WildyLevel <= pcombat) && (pcombat <= combat)))
{
InWildrange = true;
}
else
{
InWildrange = true;
}
}

Blah, anyone know?..
